translations: v.侦察；勘探（reconnoitre 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: He was engaged in agreeable meditations, reflecting that he would be sure to be promoted for the last reconnoitring expedition, and was expecting Denisov to come in.
sentences.translation: 他一边愉快地想到，他因最近一次现地侦察有功，将于几天之内晋升官阶，一边等待着不知前往何地的杰尼索夫。
